website_summaries.verdict: A great, multi-style bathroom sink that is either to install and use with a wide variety of design styles.
pros: Extra wide spacing between the faucet holes allows for plenty of room to install larger faucets and fixtures
Easy to clean around the rim
cons: Angular basin is more difficult to clean thoroughly at the corners

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! I made a walnut vanity top myself and used this sink along with a Kohler faucet. It looks amazing and very high end.
customer_reviews.author: joeshinall

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!! Broken upon delivery, cannot replace!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn't want to have to do this...but I am giving ONE star only because it was shattered upon delivery and the only option to "return or replace item" is to go through Kohler. Contacted Kohler and they said that they only replace when it's been installed, not if it was shattered through delivery...that was on Amazon. Then I search and search and there is NO WAY POSSIBLE to contact Amazon about this product and get a replacement. So I'm out money...THANKS AMAZON!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: crumbs

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in one of our bathrooms a few years ago with a custom mosaic counter top (picture attached). Unfortunately we recently had a pipe burst in the wall, and it damaged the vanity cabinet this was sitting on, as well as a bunch of drywall, and the wainscot. And, joy of joys, there was asbestos discovered in the drywall mud (house was built in 1973). Sadly, the abatement company broke the sink while doing some demo work. Very glad to be able to find the same sink again, in an attempt to re-create what we had! Will be ordering this in the next day or so!!
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: I am happy every time I use this new sink!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace an existing sink when the sand-colored commode was replaced. I love the style and it was easy to install (ok, it was easy to watch the handyman install it and it seemed easy and simple for him). As a style feature, The drain is in the middle instead of the back. This requires that you need a longer thingymabob to connect it to an existing drain line that was receiving from the back end of the sink instead. Style is great and the quality seems beyond the cost! Thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: wassersimon

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink. Stylish upgrade from the 30 year old oval
customer_reviews.text: Got "open box" and saved a few bucks and a trip to the store. No damage, no issues. Happy with my purchase. Looks good in the bathroom. Follow the cut template, measure, mark and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Finally after not receiving it, one was lost, the second one was broke. I then reordered it yet again, it took three orders over three months - I love it.
customer_reviews.author: xDarkHelmet03x

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these from Lowes and after a couple months of being told they were backordered by Kohler, I ordered them through Amazon and had them in a couple days. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Big sink for big splash
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look. Great deal from amazon. Delivered 2 broken ones first , but with no issues they sent new one. Installed with gold faucets in master bath. Nice big splash area!!
customer_reviews.author: DDouble

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but after one week, CRACK! Factory weakness.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is sending a replacement, and I believe in Kholer products ..... my husband has been a carpenter/plumber for 25 years and is very knowledgeable. He installed this a week ago with Kohler facets, following all instructions .... as he has done for years. This morning we woke up to a funny noise. Our new beautiful sink has a crack across all three center holes. It must have had a weakness from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer & David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sinks
customer_reviews.text: Love these sinks! We made a 2” walnut vanity top and the sinks finished it off beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Brown eyes

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on the internet.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a broken sink. This sink fit the bill and was $80.00 cheaper than retail. The sink was delivered 24 hours after ordering. That's fast. Perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: submit as Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I just put it on and it fits perfectly!!! Now it’s time to connect plumbing 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. I love the large size and the nice overlay. It looks great in our transitional bathroom. Timeless yet modern.
customer_reviews.author: lovinglittlebit

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sink. It was as advertised and was easy to install. Kohler makes a great product and the price from Amazon was much better than from the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was remodeling my bathroom and love the modern look of this dink
customer_reviews.author: Donna Heyrman

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing!!! Ordered one for second bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this sink, actually saw at big box store, looked on Amazon Warehouse and found it cheaper, YEAH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Most important is my return is credited to the original form of payment not an Amazon gift card!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the color! It was called biscuit(which is tan or beige) and it was just off white!!
customer_reviews.author: Debby Barnum

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. One weird caveat is it appears to have water in it from the design.
customer_reviews.author: alirds

customer_reviews.title: the product is pretty. Check the size before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and one of them had brushed nickel faucets but a chrome drain plug. ????? Other than that, the product is pretty. Check the size before you buy. They are large!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice sinks
customer_reviews.text: The sinks are very nice. I remodeled my bathroom and they are beautiful in the space. Shipping was fast and packaging was done properly to protect the sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Just the look I was going for and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sinks!! Just the look I was going for and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Seabeejen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sink was easy to install and we like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Culver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and excellent craftsmanship! Exactly what I would expect from the great Kohler name!!
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sink. Added a more up to date look. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: This is.a beautiful sink!! It is big and fits the space I have perfect
customer_reviews.author: lisagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and looks great in my bathroom. This is exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sink at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as described. Be careful with handling as it does not come packaged for some of the treatment given by shipping company. First one broke in half and had to get a second one shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines and very solid
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sink -- it looks great although a black sink is a little harder to keep looking clean than I thought about ahead of time. I was grateful to find this because we had a pre-existing hole & really needed something this size. Be aware that the size can be a bit of an issue when installing a faucet, however, because the standard length of the piece that connects the drain stopper to the faucet body is not long enough to use with a sink this size. Longer ones are available online.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McEvilley

customer_reviews.title: Siink size changes with the color!
customer_reviews.text: When buying a sink from this merchant make sure you look at the sink dimensions. They change with the color! White is 28" wide and biscuit is 22" wide(about). The dimensions are listed but who would think the same sink in a different color would be a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my bathroom- Very modern look and it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bathroom- Very modern look and it doesn't allow water to get on the rest of my counter tops! I debated on having drop in or under-mount sink.. Under-mounts are very popular, but the water is not "contained"- so you have to keep it wiped down, this allows the water to just drain and not go all over the counter tops.
customer_reviews.author: TennesseeHome

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this sink and I feel it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this sink and I feel it was an excellent price!! Came packaged well and it was easy to install. I get A LOT of compliments on my new sink and people are impressed when I tell them the price!
customer_reviews.author: GirlLady

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these sinks!
customer_reviews.text: I have vessel sinks, which leak continuously all over my vanity top from where the mounting ring meets the underside of the bowl. So, I decided to switch to a drop-in sink, but wanted something that was modern, deep and rectangular in shape. This sink fit the bill and the price was excellent. The sink is deep with a nice deck around it. It looks classy, yet modern and should never go out of style. Haven't installed it yet, but my plumber suggested this sink and I'm so glad that I went his recommendation. The sinks were well packaged and both arrived with no damage at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: retromomof2

customer_reviews.title: Cool sink
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time looking a sinks for my remodeled bathroom -- who knew there were so many. The rectangular shape is different, and looks great. I am happy with it and get lots of compliments. (And the price was wonderful.)
customer_reviews.author: suzanne crow

customer_reviews.title: Kohler rocks!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a super classy and perfectly functional bathroom sink. The Dune color is a nice subtle alternative to plain white.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink. Didn't fit the opening in my countertop
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink. Didn't fit the opening in my countertop, but it was "my bad." The sink was great!
customer_reviews.author: Lena K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after searching my local stores for a square style sink with no luck. I was worried that it might break during shipping but it arrived in perfect condition. It is beautiful and was perfect for my 1920's design inspired bathroom reno. I will post a picture soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love our new sinks! Arrived packed well and simple instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Susan RW Smith

customer_reviews.title: MT
customer_reviews.text: This over counter lavatory is so pretty. The normal oval shape lavatory is just can't compete with this one. I use it at my 2nd bathroom at 60' vanity top and still bring the elegant feeling even just one set. Just be very careful that this set might be a little longer to fit regular 22' vanity length. My contractor worked very carefully to set up this set.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieT

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2356-8-0 Archer Drop-In Bathroom Sink with 8-Inch Centers, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteArcher offers a timeless appeal, blending subtle elements of Craftsman woodworking techniques and the intricate facets of jewelry. Distinguished by its beveled edges and clean geometry, the Archer sink creates a universal look that suits an array of bathroom styles.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Archer self-rimming lavatory features the transitional aesthetic of the Archer Suite, blending subtle design elements found in craftsman furniture's chamfering techniques and the intricate facets of jewelry. This combination of beveled edges and curved bases create a timeless appeal that suits an array of design motifs.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Classic rectangular basin with beveled edges and clean geometry.
MATERIAL: Vitreous china for lasting beauty and exceptional durability.
COORDINATION: Coordinates with other products in the Archer collection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
